WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([CategoryId], [Content], [DateCreated], [DateModified], [Description], [HomeFlag], [HotFlag], [Image], [Name], [OriginalPrice], [Price], [PromotionPrice], [SeoAlias], [SeoDescription], [SeoKeywords], [SeoPageTitle], [Status], [Tags], [Unit], [ViewCount])
VALUES (i.[CategoryId], i.[Content], i.[DateCreated], i.[DateModified], i.[Description], i.[HomeFlag], i.[HotFlag], i.[Image], i.[Name], i.[OriginalPrice], i.[Price], i.[PromotionPrice], i.[SeoAlias], i.[SeoDescription], i.[SeoKeywords], i.[SeoPageTitle], i.[Status], i.[Tags], i.[Unit], i.[ViewCount])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted3;

INNER JOIN @inserted3 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT [x].[Id] AS [Id1], [x].[Name], [x].[CategoryId] AS [Id0], [x].[Image], [x].[Price], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Description], [x].[Content], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[ViewCount], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], CASE

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[Id], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]

END, [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[Id], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE [x].[Status] = 1
ORDER BY [DateCreated0] DESC
OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY" (0723d8ff)

        INNER JOIN [Permissions] AS [p] ON [f].[Id] = [p].[FunctionId]
        INNER JOIN [AppRoles] AS [r] ON [p].[RoleId] = [r].[Id]
        WHERE ([r].[Name] IN (N'Admin', N'Staff') AND ([f].[Id] = @__functionId_1)) AND ([p].[CanCreate] = 1))

END" (0723d8ff)
